CustomField.description: The ContentDocumentLink.Visibility value to use for converted files. For any user with permission to view the file, this further controls which set of users can actually see it. "InternalUsers" = only internal users with permission to view file (available if communities enabled) "AllUsers" = all users, including community users, with permission to view file
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The ContentDocumentLink.Visibility value to use for converted files. "InternalUsers" = only internal users with permission to view file (available if communities enabled) "AllUsers" = all users, including community users, with permission to view file
CustomField.label: Visibility
